chapter.title: Exploring MLS System Operation
chapter.para: This lab will cover some of the principals of system operation in MLS. You will learn how to gain administrative access, how to edit configuration files, schedule cron jobs, mount DVDs, add users to an MLS system, lock and unlock user accounts, remove users, and defining administrative accounts on the system.
